participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and enthusiastic, enjoys sharing her interests with others.
participant_1.background: I like to watch Seinfeld and It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia while on my boat. I have lots of friends. I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs. I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition. I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Creative and hands-on, loves working on projects and spending time with family.
participant_2.background: I'm spending the weekend working on a new 3D model for a video game. I enjoy doing DIY projects in my free time, especially drywall work. I like to eat pizza. I am a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing. My wife stays home with our kids.

content.text: What are you up to today?
I'm working on a new 3D model for a video game.
That sounds really cool! I like video games.
Me too! What games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Skyrim.
I've heard good things about Skyrim. I've never played it, though.
You should check it out! It's a really fun game.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What kind of DIY projects do you like to do?
I like to do a lot of different projects, but my favorite is probably drywall work.
It is! It's a lot of fun to build things with your hands.
I can imagine! I've never done any drywall work, but it sounds like something I'd enjoy.
You should try it! It's not as hard as it looks.
I might just have to do that. Thanks for the suggestion!
